summary: Diff adds/enhances frontend deployment diagnostics (runtime inference of network/canister ID, mismatch detection UI) and a DEPLOYMENT.md guide, but does not provide evidence of an actual IC redeploy, recorded canister IDs, or verified reachable mainnet URL outcomes requested in REQ-31/32/33.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run `dfx deploy --network ic` and capture the deployed frontend and backend canister IDs from the deployment output.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains only code/docs changes; there is no deployment output, no recorded canister IDs, and no indication that `dfx deploy --network ic` was executed successfully.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the deployed frontend is reachable via its canister URL on icp0.io and does not show “Canister ID Not Resolved”, addressing the previously failing URL `https://5cpxd-piaaa-aaaap-qib3q-cai.icp0.io`.
missing_requirements.reason: No runtime verification results or remediation of the specific previously failing URL are shown in the diff; only diagnostic tooling/documentation was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: After deployment, use the in-app Deployment Info diagnostics to confirm no frontend canister/domain mismatch and that the backend canister ID is correctly configured/visible for mainnet usage.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff updates the diagnostics UI/logic, but provides no evidence of an actual mainnet session confirmation (Network label, shareable URL match, backend canister ID not empty, and no mismatch warning).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded mismatch detection UI with destructive alert and remediation actions (e.g., “Correct Public URL”, open/copy).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on deploying and confirming no mismatch warning is shown after deployment; it does not explicitly request adding new mismatch remediation UI flows (open/copy buttons, destructive alert panel).

hallucinated_features.description: Runtime inference system for network/canister ID (icp0.io/ic0.app/raw domains) and normalized URL generation logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks to redeploy and verify reachability/config; it does not explicitly request implementing inference heuristics or supporting multiple env var names (e.g., VITE_CANISTER_ID vs VITE_FRONTEND_CANISTER_ID).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a comprehensive standalone deployment guide with checklists and templates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requests performing and recording an actual deployment/verification, not adding new documentation artifacts.
